name: finalprojekt_onlineshop
description: A Onlineshop in wich Admins can place and administrade Products with a Clientsite where costumers can put these in there shopping-cart and buy them

scripts.build-all-css: tailwindcss build ./src/styles/admin.dummyStyles.css -o ./public/css/admin.dummyStyles.css | tailwindcss build ./src/styles/mediaquerys.styles.css -o ./public/css/mediaquerys.styles.css | tailwindcss build ./src/styles/basic.styles.css -o ./public/css/basic.styles.css | tailwindcss build ./src/styles/admin.order-styles.css -o ./public/css/admin.order-styles.css | tailwindcss build ./src/styles/admin.product-styles.css -o ./public/css/admin.product-styles.css | tailwindcss build ./src/styles/costumer.order-styles.css -o ./public/css/costumer.order-styles.css | tailwindcss build ./src/styles/basic.product-styles.css -o ./public/css/basic.product-styles.css

author: Simon Gabriel Guth
